analysis: The documents all pertain to amendments or modifications to civil service rules and regulations. They cover various departments and positions, including the Interior Department, Department of Labor, railway mail service, Department of Justice, Postal Service, Department of Agriculture, and the Treasury. The changes range from adjusting the number of special agents to altering examination requirements and appointment procedures. The documents reflect a focus on refining and adapting the civil service system over time.
title: Civil Service Rule Adjustments
